question: Which two nations control the "Tierra del Fuego" archipelago?
explanation: Argentina and Chile control the Tierra del Fuego archipelago. Tierra del Fuego is an archipelago located across the Strait of Magellan in the southernmost tip of the South American mainland. This archipelago houses Cape Horn and Diego Ramirez Islands. Argentina controls the eastern half of the archipelago whereas Chile controls the western half of this archipelago.
